title: Bug 52251.0  Casting problem in RunToLineAction class
OB: The Java editor fails to open a java source file when we have PICLDebugTargetsin the debug view. There is java.lang.ClassCastExceptionat org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui.javaeditor.RunToLineAction.getContextFromModel(RunToLineAction.java:111)The getContextFromModel() method incorrectly assumes that all debug targetsare of type JDIDebugTarget. I see a few other spots in RunToLineAction where adebug target is blindly cast to a JDIDebugTarget without checking it first.I am seeing this with the R1.0 (0.137 build) driver.I don't think this isa new problem.
